itunes:title: Episode 748 - Special Guest Cleveland Browns Legend Joe Thomas
title: Episode 748 - Special Guest Cleveland Browns Legend Joe Thomas
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by future NFL Hall of Famer and former Cleveland Browns Lineman Joe Thomas to preview the next round of the NFL playoffs, talk about the Cleveland Browns upset over the Steelers, how much O-lineman are responsib...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by future NFL Hall of Famer and former Cleveland Browns Lineman Joe Thomas to preview the next round of the NFL playoffs, talk about the Cleveland Browns upset over the Steelers, how much O-lineman are responsible for on every play, partying as an NFL player, and if any current athletes have a killer instinct like Jordan or Kobe used to. 

 

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
